q: wondering if that meant David Letterman was thinking about retirement. Well... Rob Burnett the CEO of Worldwide Pants and executive producer of Late Show- says: Don't count on it. I think the first time David Letterman said he was going to leave in two years was back in 1987, Burnett says.".. Burnett downplays rumors that David Letterman will retire in 2013 after his contract expires in 2012, he himself says he has no idea when the talk show host plans retire."
